definition: to live alone/to spend time alone (or with a significant other)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: She clings to Monty to the point he doesn't have any time alone.
sentences.chinese: 她粘蒙提甚至到了根本不給他任何獨處的時間的程度。

sentences.english: Left alone with him, she entices José with suggestions of a rendezvous that night.
sentences.chinese: 在與賀塞獨處時，卡門誘惑賀塞在晚上與她幽會。

sentences.english: When Spring breezes, winter no longer freezes, my little sunshine kisses away loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 春天裏的小太陽，獨處也不再孤獨。

sentences.english: When it spends too much time alone.
Privacy is today's civilization is a myth.
sentences.chinese: 靜居獨處今天的文明中是一個神話。

sentences.english: When Simba and Nala are alone, they start to realize the depth of their feelings for each other.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆在獨處中，感到了深埋在對方心中的愛慕之情。

sentences.english: Jeremy used to have a large circle of friends, but now he likes being alone.
sentences.chinese: 傑里米以前交遊甚廣，但現在他喜歡獨處。

sentences.english: Even birds like to spend time alone and will run away from their nest sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 即使是鳥也喜歡獨處，而且時不時地會離開自己的巢。

sentences.english: But if a man would be alone, let him look at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個人渴望獨處，就請他注目於星辰吧。

sentences.english: Freedom from intrusion means that we have the right to be left alone.
sentences.chinese: 免受侵擾的自由意思是有自己獨處的權利。

sentences.english: Shirish asked Rita whether they could be alone for some time and she agreed.
sentences.chinese: 謝瑞什問麗塔他們能否獨處片刻，她同意了。

sentences.english: We all need-solitude so as to freshen ourselves up.
sentences.chinese: 人人都需要一些獨處的空間，好能更新自己。

sentences.english: Researchers have found that people are happier being with others, than being alone.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員發現人們跟他人在一起時比獨處更快樂。

sentences.english: INJ children need a good amount of time alone.
sentences.chinese: INJ兒童需要大量的時間獨處。

sentences.english: Jeremy used to have a large circle of friends but now he likes being alone.
sentences.chinese: 傑里米以前交遊甚廣，但現在他喜歡獨處。

definition: to say everything (that is on one's mind)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
